'''''Parma Eldalamberon 2''''' is the second issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|1|3}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Dæron presenting the Angerthas Cirith to King Thingol" — Bonnie GoodKnight

* Columns
** "''Beth-Luis-Nion''" — [[Paula Marmor]]
** "Tales from the Little Old Bookmaker" — Jim Vibber
** "Wondelone" — Jim Carleton
** "Learn now the Lore of Living Linguists" — Larry Krieg

* Articles
** "A Source for Tolkien's Tengwar?" — [[Jim Allan]]
** "The Black Speech Ring Inscription" — Don Keller
** "Notes on Directive Particles in Quenya and Finnish" — Paula Marmor
** "A 'New' Word in [[Gothic]]" — Larry Krieg
** "A History of Forms" — Martha Krieg

* Mathoms
* Runes: Letters to the editors
* [[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 2 backcover.png|Back cover]] — calligraphy by Jim Vibber
